key_risks: Regulatory and legal challenges, including compliance issues and anti-money laundering practices
Cybersecurity risks due to data breaches and reliance on digital services
Integration challenges from the acquisition of People's United Financial
Economic sensitivity, particularly to interest rate fluctuations
controversies: Jaroslawicz v. M&T Bank Corp case highlighting compliance issues
Class-action lawsuit due to a significant data breach involving the MOVEit file transfer tool
environmental_issues: Reducing carbon footprint as part of ESG initiatives
social_issues: Enhancing diversity and inclusion within the workforce
Strong community relationships and employee engagement
governance_issues: Pending legal proceedings and regulatory changes

sources.title: M&T's Regulatory Snag Could Test Shareholder Patience
sources.snippet: The companies have pushed back the deadline for completing their merger by five months, to Jan. 31, so M&T can address Bank Secrecy Act and anti-money-laundering concerns raised by the Federal Reserve Board.. M&T has not identified specific issues raised by the Fed, but observers say the Buffalo, N.Y., company's deal has hit an intersection of regulatory scrutiny.

sources.title: M&T Bank Data Breach: What & How It Happened? - Twingate
sources.snippet: In August 2023, it was disclosed that M&T Bank experienced a data breach that became public between May and June of the current year. The breach was attributed to a security vulnerability in the file transfer software MOVEit, which is produced by Progress Software and used by the bank.

sources.title: M&T among 1,000 places hit so far in huge data breach
sources.snippet: The biggest security breach of the year has affected 60 million people so far, including customers of Delaware's biggest bank, M&T Bank. The hack dates back to the end of May, TechCrunch said, with experts saying that the hackers knew about the vulnerability in the MOVEit software as far back as 2021.. Cl0p, a ransomware group linked to Russia, claimed responsibility for the hacks ...

sources.title: CT M&T Bank customers hit by global data breach - CT Insider
sources.snippet: M&T has been notifying all customers who may have been affected by mail. An analysis by New Zealand-based anti-virus software maker Emsisoft on data breach notifications issued by different states, Securities and Exchange Commission filings, and other public disclosures places the total number of organizations affected by the breach at 1,053, and the number of individuals at nearly 60.64 million.

sources.title: At least 95,000 M&T Bank Customers' Personal Information Compromised in ...
sources.snippet: An M&T Bank customer filed a lawsuit on August 25th, alleging that M&T Bank negligently handled the personal and financial information of over 95,000 of its customers. The lawsuit, filed in federal Court in Buffalo, New York, on behalf of a class of affected M&T customers, alleges the data was misappropriated in a data breach that occurred some time between May and June of this year.
